sentence.Network_en: The party thereby lays itself open to charges of conflict of interest.
sentence.Network_cn: 该党因此难免被人指责有利益冲突。

sentence.Network_en: Regular exercise strengthens the heart, thereby reducing the risk of heart attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 经常锻炼可以增强心脏机能，从而减少心脏病发作的危险。

sentence.Network_en: He became a British citizen, thereby gaining the right to vote.
sentence.Network_cn: 他成了英国公民, 因而得到了投票权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... guitar 六弦琴，吉他 thereby 由此，从而 passive 被动的；2.消极的.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... thereafter 在那之后 thereby 因此 therefore 所以.
2012自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... guitar 六弦琴，吉他 thereby 由此，从而 passive 被动的；2.消极的.
1-10... ... thereat adj. 在那边，因此 thereby adv. 由此，从而；在那附近 therefore adv. 因此；所以；故；乃.

list.abs: He wished to travel and thereby study the customs of other countries ., 他希望去旅游借此研究其他国家的民俗风情.
we started our journey early , thereby avoiding most of the traffic ., 我们早早地上了路 , 因此避开了许多车辆.

what is more , the rather that still a few families hope thereby is collected a few have style not to come again too expensive stuff , e.g. calligraphy paint .每家都有几件旧家什，放着占地方，扔了可惜，要能卖个比收破烂高点的价钱，多数人都乐意。何况还有一些家庭希望藉此收集一些有格调又不至太贵的东西，比如说书法绘画作品。
to agricultural growth slowed down , thereby also affected the pace of industrialization and so on ., 使农业增长速度放慢 , 从而也影响了工业化的速度等等.

jx.jx_en_mean: used to indicate that there is more to say about something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 这里面有一段故事；其中大有文章；说来话长

entry.def: You use thereby to introduce an important result or consequence of the event or action you have just mentioned.

example.ex: Our bodies can sweat, thereby losing heat by evaporation...
example.tran: 我们的身体能出汗，由此可以蒸发散热。

example.ex: A firm might sometimes sell at a loss to drive a competitor out of business, and thereby increase its market power.
example.tran: 公司有时会通过亏本出售来将对手挤垮，从而提高其市场地位。

means.word_mean: 1. by that means or because of that;

sentences.sentence: "He knocked over the red wine, thereby ruining the table cloth"

auth_sentence.content: Large animals are thereby less affected by temperature extremes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Large animals are thereby less affected by temperature extremes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Large animals are thereby less affected by temperature extremes.

auth_sentence.content: Thereby fixing a permanent bar against any relief.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thereby fixing a permanent bar against any relief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thereby fixing a permanent bar against any relief.

auth_sentence.content: The Prince suspended the constitution, thereby dissolving the National Council.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Prince suspended the constitution, thereby dissolving the National Council.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Prince suspended the constitution, thereby dissolving the National Council.

sentences.en: He became a British citizen, thereby gaining the right to vote.
sentences.cn: 他成了英国公民, 因而得到了投票权。

jushi.english: He became a British citizen, thereby gaining the right to vote.
jushi.chinese: 他成了英国公民,因而得到了投票权。

jushi.english: She wished to travel in Asia and thereby study the customs of the eastern countries.
jushi.chinese: 她想到亚洲旅行,因此学习东方国家的习俗。
